abstract: Blackstone and Wells Fargo are poised to buy most of the portfolio, which includes office and apartment buildings, people with knowledge of the matter said.
snippet: Blackstone and Wells Fargo are poised to buy most of the portfolio, which includes office and apartment buildings, people with knowledge of the matter said.
lead_paragraph: General Electric is poised to sell its enormous real estate portfolio in a sale that could fetch about $30 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter who spoke on the condition of anonymity.

headline.main: G.E. Seen Close to Selling Its Real Estate Portfolio
headline.print_headline: In Bid to Refocus, G.E. Is Said to Be Close to Selling Real Estate Portfolio
